results.title: Exogenous intoxication by non-prescribed use of vitamin D, a case report
results.text_hl: Meanwhile, 25 OH vitamin D dosage and diluted @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@vitamin D@@@ test confirmed the diagnosis of @DISEASE_Hypervitaminosis_A @DISEASE_MESH:D006986 @@@hypervitaminosis D.@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Blast_Crisis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001752 @@@Hypercalcemic crisis@@@ was managed with vigorous hydration (50 ml/kg in 2 h), @CHEMICAL_Furosemide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005665 @@@furosemide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Diphosphonates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004164 @@@bisphosphonates@@@ and blood pressure control with @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: de Paula ALT, Gonzaga WPF, Oliveira LM, Feibelmann TCM, Markus J. Exogenous intoxication by non-prescribed use of vitamin D, a case report BMC Geriatr. 2020 Jun 24;20(1):221. PMID: 32580697
citations.BibTeX: @article{32580697, title={Exogenous intoxication by non-prescribed use of vitamin D, a case report}, author={de Paula ALT and Gonzaga WPF and Oliveira LM and Feibelmann TCM and Markus J}, journal={BMC Geriatr}, volume={20}, number={1}, pages={221}}

results.title: The role of presynaptic beta-receptors in Raynaud's disease.
results.text_hl: Moreover, chronic treatment with the correct Beta-blocker was seen to prevent @<m>DISEASE_Blast_Crisis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001752 @@@angiospastic crisis@@@ in these @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Brotzu G, Carboni MG, Falchi S, Montisci R, Petruzzo P. The role of presynaptic beta-receptors in Raynaud's disease. Artery. 1985;13(2):77-86. PMID: 3002305
citations.BibTeX: @article{3002305, title={The role of presynaptic beta-receptors in Raynaud's disease.}, author={Brotzu G and Carboni MG and Falchi S and Montisci R and Petruzzo P}, journal={Artery}, volume={13}, number={2}, pages={77-86}}
